profile_data.summary:
I'm an Applied Data Scientist with over 3 years of experience developing and optimizing AI-driven solutions, specializing in machine learning, NLP, and Copilot-like AI applications. I have deep expertise in transformer-based models (GPT-4, T5, BERT, Gemini), retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), reinforcement learning (RLHF), and hyperparameter tuning. My experience includes deploying scalable AI models in cloud environments (AWS, GCP, Azure) and working with big data analytics, ETL pipelines, and AI explainability (SHAP, LIME). Currently, I am an Associate Data Scientist at Yellow Parka Labs, where I build intelligent AI solutions that enhance user experiences. I also have experience in MLOps & Model Deployment (Docker, Kubernetes, FastAPI, MLflow), database management (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Apache Kafka), and data visualization (Tableau, Power BI, Google Analytics).

I hold a Master’s in Data Science from George Washington University and am currently enrolled in Stanford University’s Artificial Intelligence Professional Program, further deepening my expertise in Deep Learning, Multi-Task Learning, and Generative AI. With strong programming skills in Python, R, SQL, JavaScript, C++, and Matlab, I am passionate about building scalable, explainable, and high-performance AI systems that drive business impact. Let’s connect and explore opportunities in AI, Data Science, and Machine Learning!
profile_data.headline: Data Scientist | AI Developer @ Yellow Parka Labs | Stanford AI | Deep Multi-Task and Meta Learning Models.

experience.description:
● Developed and fine-tuned transformer-based NLP models, such as OpenAI’s GPT series and Google's Gemini, to power Copilot-like AI trip planner with contextual understanding and dynamic response generation that works alongside customers.
● Optimized model performance through techniques like prompt engineering, reinforcement learning with human
feedback (RLHF), and fine-tuning on domain-specific datasets to enhance Copilot accuracy and user experience
with a 40% increase in user engagement within 3 months.
● Optimized model efficiency by leveraging LoRA (Low-Rank Adaptation) and quantization techniques (e.g., 8-bit
and 4-bit precision using BitsAndBytes and Hugging Face’s Transformers) to reduce memory footprint and
accelerate inference speed.
● Designed an automated evaluation pipeline using BLEU, ROUGE, METEOR, and perplexity, precision, recall,
and F1-score scores to measure language model quality and iteratively improve Copilot-generated responses.
● Deployed AI models in distributed systems using model parallelism, data parallelism, and all-reduce operations,
ensuring scalable and efficient inference for real-time Copilot interactions.
● Addressed hallucination issues in AI-generated content by implementing Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
with FAISS and Pinecone vector databases, ensuring responses were grounded in relevant, factual data.
● Automated model training and deployment pipelines using AWS SageMaker, Apache Airflow, and Kubernetes,
enabling continuous learning and seamless integration of model updates into production.
● Conducted hyperparameter tuning using Optuna and Bayesian optimization and Grid Search to enhance model
performance and reduce latency.
● Designed multi-turn conversation handling using Memory-Augmented Transformers.
● Developed explainability and interpretability features using SHAP and LIME, providing insights into model
decisions and increasing user trust in AI-driven recommendations.
